price: (Iblis) kaa sε: “Me Wura Nyankopͻn, εneε ma me berε kͻpem da a yεbenyane awufoͻ“.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
